name: Crazy Quiz! Are You Crazy Enough?
overview: The combination of quiz show and party games on Wii. Combine up to four players in a colorful 3D TV studio. There are eight animated and customizable player characters to choose from. Accompanied by the moderator Max, Answer many quiz questions and complete exciting mini-games in an impressive environment. More than 1,800 questions in nine different subject areas. Features: Real studio environment in a 3D TV studio with presenter Max. Unique player characters, each with four different outfits that can be activated in the course of the game. Different multiplayer and single player game modes. Wide range of entertainment with quizzes and mini games for the whole family.
